backend/main.mo: Main actor defining SurgeryCase with Task type (separate selected/completed fields for 7 tasks), user profiles, OpenAI config, and CRUD operations with authorization checks via MixinAuthorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldSurgeryCase with CompletedTasks to NewSurgeryCase with Task type, setting all tasks as selected by default and preserving completion status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three features: task selection workflow fix, default task checkbox states, and MM/DD/YYYY date formatting with auto-advance behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend TypeScript/React components covering authentication, case management, task handling with Task type, CSV import/export, date fields with auto-advance, and checklist editing in creation/completion modes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA metadata, favicon links, manifest reference, and root div for React mounting; sets light color scheme and Surgery Case Log title.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Surgery Case Log app metadata, icons, display mode (standalone), theme colors, and categorization as medical/productivity/business application.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets, precaching app shell on install, cleaning old caches on activate, and skipping authentication/API calls from caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that handles authentication flow, profile setup, and view routing between cases and settings. Includes defensive logic to prevent dark mode and retry mechanism for authentication failures.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component for Internet Identity authentication that handles login/logout actions and clears query cache on logout. Includes error recovery for duplicate authentication attempts.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for name entry. Cannot be dismissed until profile is created.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, pDVM notification, labs, etc.) with default selections and provides utility functions to calculate task completion status and filter remaining items.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file for camera capture modal component (not yet implemented).
Card component displaying individual surgery case details with expandable notes, task checklist toggles, edit/delete actions, and formatted date displays. Includes delete confirmation dialog.

Dialog form for creating/editing surgery cases with fields for patient info, dates, and task checklist. Includes AI-powered structured text parsing, auto-prefill from matched MRN, and field-level edit tracking.
Main view component for displaying surgery cases list with search, sort, species/task filters, and CSV import/export. Shows filtered count and handles case creation/editing through dialog.
Search input component with icon for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select component for choosing case sort order using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for selecting species (canine, feline, other) with checkboxes, persisting selections to sessionStorage and displaying an active filter count badge.
A popover filter component for selecting task types from a checklist, persisting selections to sessionStorage and showing an active count badge on the trigger button.
A checklist editor component that renders checkboxes for task items, supporting both creation mode (selecting tasks to assign) and completion mode (marking tasks as done).
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling file parsing, validation errors, progress tracking, and backend mutations with toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component with calendar picker that formats dates as MM/DD/YYYY, auto-inserts slashes during typing, validates input on blur, and optionally auto-advances to the next field on completion.
CSV import/export logic for surgery cases, including parsing CSV rows with quoted field handling, validating data, matching existing cases by medical record number, and generating downloadable CSV files.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema with 17 columns for surgery case import/export, including header names, validation constants for species/sex/boolean values, and documentation of expected formats and field mappings.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides functions to filter surgery cases by species and by incomplete task types using checklist item definitions.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l confusion), and removing artifacts; serves as fallback for AI analysis.
Parses label:value formatted text into CaseFormData by matching field patterns and applying type-specific parsing (species, sex, dates); serves as fallback for AI responses and Quick Fill feature.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Searches surgery cases by matching query against basic fields (MRN, pet name, owner, species, breed, sex, complaint, notes) and incomplete task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file placeholder for AI image analysis service.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Sorts surgery cases by arrival date (newest/oldest) or open task count (most/fewest) with predefined sort options.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines CaseFormData interface and constant options for species (canine, feline, other) and sex (male, male neutered, female, female spayed).
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including required string fields, species/sex parsing with fuzzy matching, boolean parsing, and date validation.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: React component for configuring OpenAI API key with validation status display, secure input field with show/hide toggle, and save functionality using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a changing value with configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout cleanup pattern.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, including fetching all cases, fetching by MRN, creating, updating, and deleting cases with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue theme with OKLCH color tokens for UI components, patient names, and presenting complaints.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Tesseract.js OCR library, including worker creation, recognition options, and result structures with text, confidence, and bounding box data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions for colors using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, Inter font family, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state for a veterinary case management system tracking three feature requests: fixing task selection workflow from case creation to case cards, implementing default checkbox states for seven task types, and formatting date fields with MM/DD/YYYY format and auto-advance behavior.
